name: Orbit Jam
description:
Work in Progress! Sadly res is still locked at 800x800 px and performace is quite poor. Please report anything strange you encounter or difficulties on download. Feel free to share your thoughts of the game and what could be done!

Playing is super straight-forward, use Arrows to move and Space Bar to shoot . Pick up special ammo types to multiply your points and damage, while you dodge and shoot everything that comes up! You can adjust game volume with keys O and P.

I left a "testing" tool feature that can be activated by pressing Control.

Orbit Jam is a two-month university project and will be finished by February 1st.  It's also my very first Java program, and i'll share the source code and resources on Github once it's released. In case you are interested, everything I did or borrowed is free to use (CC0)

Credits & Acknowledgements

Code - Daniel Fuertes

Sprites -  Daniel Fuertes & Kenney at https://www.kenney.nl/

Audio - Kenney & freesound.org

Music -  Original Jun at https://freesound.org/people/orginaljun/

Thanks to Vicenç Soler, Universitat Autònoma Barcelona

System requirements:

Java 8 JRE or later and ~25MB of disk space
